languages.text: "Друкари веками оттачивают искусство убийства, а ты ранен и истощен — оставь мечты об одиночном крестовом походе против ксеносов".
"The Drukhari have been perfecting their art of killing for centuries, whereas you are wounded and exhausted — abandon your dream of a lone crusade against the xenos."
languages.original_text: "Друкари веками оттачивают искусство убийства, а ты ранен и истощен — оставь мечты об одиночном крестовом походе против ксеносов".

traits.locale_text: "The Drukhari have been perfecting their art of killing for centuries, whereas you are wounded and exhausted — abandon your dream of a lone crusade against the xenos."
"The Drukhari have been perfecting their art of killing for centuries, whereas you are wounded and exhausted — abandon your dream of a lone crusade against the xenos."
"The Drukhari have been perfecting their art of killing for centuries, whereas you are wounded and exhausted — abandon your dream of a lone crusade against the xenos."
"The Drukhari have been perfecting their art of killing for centuries, whereas you are wounded and exhausted — abandon your dream of a lone crusade against the xenos."
"The Drukhari have been perfecting their art of killing for centuries, whereas you are wounded and exhausted — abandon your dream of a lone crusade against the xenos."

languages.text: 「デュカーリは何世紀にもわたって殺戮の技を磨き続けてきた。一方で君は負傷し、疲弊している。たった一人で異種族に立ち向かおうなどという夢は捨てるんだ」
languages.original_text: "The Drukhari have been perfecting their art of killing for centuries, whereas you are wounded and exhausted — abandon your dream of a lone crusade against the xenos."

traits.locale_text: 「デュカーリは何世紀にもわたって殺戮の技を磨き続けてきた。一方で君は負傷し、疲弊している。たった一人で異種族に立ち向かおうなどという夢は捨てるんだ」

languages.text: "Die Drukhari haben ihre Kunst des Tötens über Jahrhunderte perfektioniert, wohingegen Ihr verwundet und erschöpft seid – lasst Euren Traum von einem einsamen Kreuzzug gegen die Xenos fahren."
languages.original_text: "The Drukhari have been perfecting their art of killing for centuries, whereas you are wounded and exhausted — abandon your dream of a lone crusade against the xenos."

traits.locale_text: "Die Drukhari haben ihre Kunst des Tötens über Jahrhunderte perfektioniert, wohingegen Ihr verwundet und erschöpft seid – lasst Euren Traum von einem einsamen Kreuzzug gegen die Xenos fahren."

languages.text: « Les Drukharis ont consacré des siècles à peaufiner l'art de tuer, alors que vous êtes blessé et épuisé. Oubliez votre croisade solitaire contre les xénos. »
languages.original_text: "The Drukhari have been perfecting their art of killing for centuries, whereas you are wounded and exhausted — abandon your dream of a lone crusade against the xenos."

traits.locale_text: « Les Drukharis ont consacré des siècles à peaufiner l'art de tuer, alors que vous êtes blessé et épuisé. Oubliez votre croisade solitaire contre les xénos. »

languages.text: «Los Drukhari llevan siglos perfeccionando sus artes homicidas; usted, sin embargo, está malherido y exhausto. Renuncie a su cruzada suicida contra los xenos, no es más que un sueño».
languages.original_text: "The Drukhari have been perfecting their art of killing for centuries, whereas you are wounded and exhausted — abandon your dream of a lone crusade against the xenos."

traits.locale_text: «Los Drukhari llevan siglos perfeccionando sus artes homicidas; usted, sin embargo, está malherido y exhausto. Renuncie a su cruzada suicida contra los xenos, no es más que un sueño».

languages.text: “千百年来，黑暗灵族一直在杀戮的道路上精益求精，而你已经受了伤，筋疲力尽。还是别再幻想什么孤胆英雄杀光异形的故事了吧。”
languages.original_text: "The Drukhari have been perfecting their art of killing for centuries, whereas you are wounded and exhausted — abandon your dream of a lone crusade against the xenos."

traits.locale_text: “千百年来，黑暗灵族一直在杀戮的道路上精益求精，而你已经受了伤，筋疲力尽。还是别再幻想什么孤胆英雄杀光异形的故事了吧。”

languages.text: "Drukhariler asırlardır öldürme sanatında ustalaşmayı sürdürüyor, sense yaralı ve bitkin hâldesin. Zenolara karşı tek başına savaşma hayalini unut."
languages.original_text: "The Drukhari have been perfecting their art of killing for centuries, whereas you are wounded and exhausted — abandon your dream of a lone crusade against the xenos."

traits.locale_text: "Drukhariler asırlardır öldürme sanatında ustalaşmaya devam ediyor, sense yaralı ve bitkin hâldesin. Zenolara karşı tek başına cihada gitme hayalini unut."
